All functions

bike_tire_pressures

Compute front and rear tire pressures based on data for bike and rider.

btpress

droop_pressure_psi

Compute the 15% droop tire pressure based on wheel load and tire size

dual_pressure_point

Data point formatting function.

dual_pressure

Y axis label formatting function.

dual_weight

X axis label formatting function

lb_to_kg

Convert pounds to kilograms

plot_bike_inflation

Plot and label front and rear wheel inflation data for a bike.

plot_title

Display a generic title or bike summary info.

psi_to_bar

#' Better safety and comfort color #' @keywords internal recommended_pressure_color <- "#33cc33" # lime green Convert PSI to Bar

tire_sizes_mm

Nominal tire sizes.

wheel_loads_lbs

X axis values for wheel loads in lbs
